title: r/AmITheA**hole For Firing A Spoiled Karen?
description: r/AmITheA**hole OP owns a daycare for young children, and she runs into a problem with one of her customers, a complete Karen. The Karen keeps trying to guilt trip OP into breaking her own rules and letting Karen's child bring a tablet into the daycare. Karen eventually crosses the line when she tries to make OP the bad guy in her child's eyes, so OP fires her! Karen leaves in tears, leaving OP to wonder if perhaps she was the butthole in this situation.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
